skills.title: Programming Languages
skills.description: Java, Python, C/C++, SQL, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, CSS, SystemVerilog

skills.title: Tools
skills.description: React.js, React Native, Node.js, Git, Linux, Microsoft Azure, Firebase, Xcode, JUnit, PyTorch, NumPy, Spark

portfolio.title: Dotorii: Scan Your Plan
portfolio.description: An iOS app to enhance accessibility by enabling users to capture posters or scan QR codes and automatically integrate the information into Google Calendar.

portfolio.title: Games Capstone: Mixed Up Power Ups
portfolio.description: A dynamic platformer game with diverse power-ups for strategic navigation and level completion, offering a fun and challenging experience.

portfolio.title: Distributed Key-Value Store
portfolio.description: Engineered a scalable, fault-tolerant key-value store using the Paxos consensus algorithm. Developed a distributed system with state machine replication and database sharding for efficient data management.

portfolio.title: Flight Booking Application
portfolio.description: A Java app for account management, flight booking, and secure transactions via command-line interface, using SQL transactions and Microsoft Azure SQL Server for conflict-free multi-user access.

portfolio.title: UW Campus Map
portfolio.description: A Java application that finds the shortest path between locations on the University of Washington campus.

portfolio.title: Flappy Bird Game on FPGA
portfolio.description: Reverse-engineered the classic game 'Flappy Bird' and implemented it on an FPGA using SystemVerilog, achieving a smooth 60 FPS gameplay experience.
